EmailTemplate.name: 12-10-21 RET NACS Webinar Thank You Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the NACS Self-Checkout Innovations in Convenience Retailing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for attending the NACS Self-Checkout Innovations in Convenience Retailing webinar. Alan Meyer, Chief Executive Officer at Meyer Oil Company, was happy to share how his company successfully implemented the self-checkout method and the innovations being applied around the globe to help create a quicker and hassle-free self-checkout experience. In case you missed the webinar, check out the on-demand replay below to stay up to date on the latest self-checkout innovations! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Interested in learning more? Contact Sales today! <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
